text: midneun jadeul-iyeo hananim-eul du lyeowohago geubun-ui seonjijaleul mid-eula geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo neohui wie geu bun-ui eunheleul dubaelo deohayeo jusil geos-imyeo neohuiga geol-eogal gil-e bich-eul jusil geos-imyeo neohuiege gwan-yong-eul be pusinani sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasinila
